resources.string: Illegal character. Please use only letters, numbers and underscores.
Username must be 4 characters or more and must use alphanumeric characters or the symbols _.@+
Password must be 7 characters or more and cannot contain spaces.
Username must be 4 characters or more and must use alphanumeric characters or the symbols _.@+\n\nPassword must be 7 characters or more and cannot contain spaces.
